Reviews.Title: Execllent HDTV Buy!
Reviews.Author: D Finest 1
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this HDTV at a reasonable price shortly after purchasing their 39" HDTV and I must say Affinity exceeded my expectations. The size appears to be slightly bigger than another 50" HDTV I was comparing it to. The picture quality is excellent. There was one thing that I had to get adjusted to... the speakers are built in the back of the TV set. So at times I had to increase the volume therefore the sound could project louder...however that issue was quickly rectified by purchasing an affordable wireless sound bar. Normally I do not leave review comments but I figure it helped me select this brand and I could do the same for someone else who is looking to purchase an affordable, great quality, HDTV.
